question: Klatskin tumor resembles-
exp: Ans. is 'b' i. e., Cholangiocarcinoma o Extrahepatic adenocercinoma of bileducts, when proximal, is referred to as hilar cholangiocarcinoma (Klatskin's tumor).

question: Which does not predispose to cholangiocarcinoma:
exp: Ans. is 'd' i. e., Chronic pancreatitis Risk factors for Cholangiocarcinoma. Primary sclerosing cholangitis. Choledochal cyst. Ulcerative colitis Mnemonic 5 C's. Clonorchis sinensis inf. Chronic typhoid carriers. Other risk factors. Hepatolithiasis. Biliary enteric anastomosis. Liver flukes. Dietary nitrosamines. Exposure to thorotrast, dioxin
